Title: Polit zolotoyi mushky
Actors: Bogdan Yusipchuk, Sofia Kravchyshyn, Sergiy Velykyi, Oleh Tsiona
Plot: A little girl called a boy's name, Mykola, is not an ordinary child. She is a poet, and she knows everything (as her Grampa told her) - that it's not good to lie, that a movie in the sky is...
